Schema for representing a PersonInImage instance.
Details a specific person's bounding box in an image.

get.description: List albums viewable by the current user

post.description: Create a new album with optional view/edit groups

get.description: Retrieve full details of a single album

patch.description: Update album name, description, and group permissions

get.description:
Download all images in an album as a ZIP archive.
You can choose original or full-size paths. Requires view access.

patch.description: Reorder images in the album using a list of image IDs

400.description: Sorting list mismatch with album contents

get.description: List root image folders with permission filtering
Get details of a specific image folder with children and images

post.description:
Creates multiple groups from a list of group schemas using bulk_create.

Args:
    request: The Django request object.
    data: A GroupListInCreateSchema object containing the list of groups to create.

Returns:
    A list of GroupOutSchema objects representing the created groups.
